channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Fileviewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Fileviewer

item.title: CVE-2021-24491|2024-08-03T19:35:20.117Z -- unknown -- fileviewer
item.description: The Fileviewer WordPress plugin through 2.2 does not have CSRF checks in place when performing actions such as upload and delete files. As a result, attackers could make a logged in administrator delete and upload arbitrary files via a CSRF attack
